mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.RBNO AS RBNO, A.RBSUBJECT AS RBSUBJECT, A.RBNAME AS RBNAME, A.RBIMG AS RBIMG, A.RBCONTENT AS RBCONTENT, A.ACADEMY_ANO AS ACADEMY_ANO, A.MEMBER_MNO AS MEMBER_MNO, A.RBGRADE AS RBGRADE, A.RBDELETEYN AS RBDELETEYN, TO_CHAR(A.RBINSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RBINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.RBUPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RBUPDATEDATE, CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.RBNO DESC)/#{pagesize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) PAGENO, COUNT(A.RBNO) OVER() AS TOTALCOUNT, #{curpage, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS CURPAGE, #{pagesize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS PAGESIZE, #{groupsize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS GROUPSIZE, #{pno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS PNO, B.ANO AS ANO, B.ANAME AS ANAME FROM REVIEWBOARD A, PAGING P, ACADEMY B WHERE RBDELETEYN = 'N' AND PNO='P002' AND A.ACADEMY_ANO = B.ANO ORDER BY 1 DESC ) WHERE PAGENO=#{curpage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
